changeSet.author: srb55
changeSet.comment: SQL needed to convert app doc status
changeSet.sql:
update cynergy.krew_doc_hdr_t t set (app_doc_stat, app_doc_stat_mdfn_dt) = (select s.reqs_stat_desc, trunc(sysdate) + 365 from pur_reqs_t p, pur_reqs_stat_t s where p.reqs_stat_cd is not null and p.reqs_stat_cd = s.reqs_stat_cd and p.fdoc_nbr = t.doc_hdr_id) where exists (select 'Y' from pur_reqs_t p where p.reqs_stat_cd is not null and p.fdoc_nbr = t.doc_hdr_id)
/ update cynergy.krew_doc_hdr_t t set (app_doc_stat, app_doc_stat_mdfn_dt) = (select s.po_stat_desc, trunc(sysdate) + 365 from pur_po_t p, pur_po_stat_t s where p.po_stat_cd is not null and p.po_stat_cd = s.po_stat_cd and p.fdoc_nbr = t.doc_hdr_id) where exists (select 'Y' from pur_po_t p where p.po_stat_cd is not null and p.fdoc_nbr = t.doc_hdr_id)
/ update cynergy.krew_doc_hdr_t t set (app_doc_stat, app_doc_stat_mdfn_dt) = (select s.pmt_rqst_stat_desc, trunc(sysdate) + 365 from ap_pmt_rqst_t p, ap_pmt_rqst_stat_t s where p.pmt_rqst_stat_cd is not null and p.pmt_rqst_stat_cd = s.pmt_rqst_stat_cd and p.fdoc_nbr = t.doc_hdr_id) where exists (select 'Y' from ap_pmt_rqst_t p where p.pmt_rqst_stat_cd is not null and p.fdoc_nbr = t.doc_hdr_id)
/ update cynergy.krew_doc_hdr_t t set (app_doc_stat, app_doc_stat_mdfn_dt) = (select s.crdt_memo_stat_desc, trunc(sysdate) + 365 from ap_crdt_memo_t p, ap_crdt_memo_stat_t s where p.crdt_memo_stat_cd is not null and p.crdt_memo_stat_cd = s.crdt_memo_stat_cd and p.fdoc_nbr = t.doc_hdr_id) where exists (select 'Y' from ap_crdt_memo_t p where p.crdt_memo_stat_cd is not null and p.fdoc_nbr = t.doc_hdr_id)
/ update cynergy.krew_doc_hdr_t t set (app_doc_stat, app_doc_stat_mdfn_dt) = (select s.rcvng_ln_stat_desc, trunc(sysdate) + 365 from pur_rcvng_ln_t p, pur_rcvng_ln_stat_t s where p.rcvng_ln_stat_cd is not null and p.rcvng_ln_stat_cd = s.rcvng_ln_stat_cd and p.fdoc_nbr = t.doc_hdr_id) where exists (select 'Y' from pur_rcvng_ln_t p where p.rcvng_ln_stat_cd is not null and p.fdoc_nbr = t.doc_hdr_id)
/
